summary: This is a demo of a mod that will adds temples in Skyrim for all the gods that don\'t have one.
descriptionHtml:
This is a demo of a mod that will adds Temples in Skyrim for all the gods that don\'t have one.
The mod goal is to improve roleplaying for player who play a religious character.


The mod currently include a Zenithar Temple way north of Winterhold with a few features:

-Villagers and Priests that are praying at the temple.

-Donation bowls that will give you the Gift of Charity buff, more money you give, longer is the buff.

-Shrines of Zenithar.

-Praying altar of Zenithar: This altar will give you Prayer of Zenithar which is the same as blessing of Zenithar but double the strength and length.


What would I like to include in the final version:

-Blessings that won\'t overwrite each other, if that is even possible.

-Schedule for some vanilla npcs so they will come visit the temple.

-Temples for the following gods: Akatosh,Arkay,Julianos and Stendaar.

-Custom conversation for the priests and villager, maybe even a speech for one of the priest.

-A small quest line maybe? Will have to find a good one.


Installation
---------------------

1-Extract the file to your skyrim folder.
2-Enable TemplesofSkyrim in your launcher
3-Play!

Uninstallation
------------
1-In your data folder, remove TemplesofSkyrim.esp and its bsa.



Requirements
------------
latest patch


Notes
-----

-The current location of the temple isn\'t final, I might move it closer if too many people don\'t like the location.

-I changed a copy of the Mara temple so don\'t be surprise if it looks a bit similar.
author: Littleork
